channel.title: City of Whispers (Play Test) - Tuesdays in Sept/Oct
channel.description:
**The Pitch**
* City of Whispers is a **city fantasy game**, **powered by the Apocalypse**, currently in development. * Players assume the role of city denizens in a world filled with dangerous magic, political intrigue, and personal entanglements. * In addition to generating characters, the first session entails creating the city and its factions.
Rules: https://danmbrown.github.io/city-of-whispers/
**At-a-Glance**
* **Schedule** : Eight Tuesdays in September and October x 2.5-hours/session * **Breaks** : Two 10-minute breaks * **Venue** : GM’s Zoom * **Recording Session** : With consent from all players * **Posting Recording** : With consent from all players * **Attendance** : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required * **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players
**Sign-up**
* Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oNRAOw1qMewca9DzK * Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oNYuRGu1JpNrS1y4h * Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oNfttFc8Esgg4ovi1 * Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oNisQqCLTgz7lrM9z * Session 5: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oNs2ITAAUwAw6BOQA * Session 6: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oNvsSpHRMEQT1aAW8 * Session 7: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oO-4T-p5VwaN999-p * Session 8: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oO32vwTiHfg03SMlU

item.title: City of Whispers (Play Test) - Tuesdays in Sept/Oct
item.dc:creator: @brownorama
item.description:
@brownorama wrote:

The Pitch

  • City of Whispers is a city fantasy game, powered by the Apocalypse, currently in development.
  • Players assume the role of city denizens in a world filled with dangerous magic, political intrigue, and personal entanglements.
  • In addition to generating characters, the first session entails creating the city and its factions.

Rules: https://danmbrown.github.io/city-of-whispers/

At-a-Glance

  • Schedule : Eight Tuesdays in September and October x 2.5-hours/session
  • Breaks : Two 10-minute breaks
  • Venue : GM’s Zoom
  • Recording Session : With consent from all players
  • Posting Recording : With consent from all players
  • Attendance : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required
  • Safety : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players

Sign-up

  • Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8oNRAOw1qMewca9DzK
